Description:
Support Service Office by managing schedules , arranging meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements. 
Coordinate and prepare materials for meetings, presentations, and conferences. 
Assist with the preparation of reports, correspondence, and other documents as required. 
Handle sensitive and confidential information with utmost discretion. 
Act as a liaison between senior executives and internal/external stakeholders, ensuring effective communication and timely responses. 
Prioritize and respond to incoming communications, including emails, phone calls, and other inquiries. 
Provide administrative support, including drafting and proofreading documents, maintaining filing systems, and handling expense reports. 
Prepare and distribute meeting agendas, minutes, and follow-up actions. 
Anticipate and address any issues or challenges that may arise. 
Assist with special projects and initiatives as assigned. Skills
Skills:
Excellent organization and time-management skills. 
Excellent communication skills. 
Ability to multitask & support the needs of multiple and diverse projects. 
Ability to work independently, as well as in a team environment. 
Integrity and the ability to establish strong work relationships. 
Good analytical skills and cost consciousness. 
Competent in problem solving, initiative and pro activeness. 
Excellent command of English spoken and written at business level.

Strong identification with the IKEA culture and values  
Drive to exceed results within a given framework

Attention to detail 
Ability to work with tight deadlines 
Create Togetherness 
Find Better Ways
